title: "Homework"

After each class session, several homework problems will be assigned, due the following Monday by 11:59pm. Homework should be submitted to [Gradescope](https://www.gradescope.com/courses/425901) and may either be typed and submitted as a .pdf, or handwritten and scanned as an image. 

#### Extensions

Up to twice throughout the term, an extension may be requwested on a homework assignment. Except in extraordinary circumstances, requests must be made prior to an assignment's due date.
